function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Use of multiple data collection methods, triangulation of data, and peer review of findings","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resource allocation, support for mental health, and emergency response planning","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use random sampling in addition to purposive sampling to ensure more representative results.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use virtual communication methods and adhere to strict infection control guidelines for in-person interviews.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Diversify data collection time frames and continuously update data analysis to account for changes.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of proper personal protective equipment ppe for both participants and researchers, implementation of strict hygiene protocols, and regular testing for infectious diseases","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict infection control measures, regular monitoring of participants and researchers for symptoms, and collaboration with public health authorities for risk assessment","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop and implement a comprehensive crisis management plan for covid-19","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health support programs, counseling services, stress management workshops","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flexible work arrangements, mental health support, transportation assistance","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection control measures, education on safe practices, improved transportation","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water
